title: Looking for a sans without a hook on the lowercase 'j', any suggestions?
content:
Futura is the favourite so far, any suggestions along those lines? Ideally something that comes in a good variey of weights.

thanks!
author: hungrymoon

comments.content: [Priori Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20110524040805/http:/www.emigre.com/EF.php?fid=197) from Emigre? There's a wide range of weights and alternate versions, and the pricing is pretty good.

[Identifont](http://web.archive.org/web/20110524040805/http:/www.identifont.com/) appears to have a few [suggestions](http://web.archive.org/web/20110524040805/http:/www.identifont.com/identify?12+j+7V+9M+97+7K+F+6M0+9J+G39+8W+76Y+9Z+L+M) that might be worth going through as a starting point.
